REUTERS.UNKNOWN: L C f1367 reute u f BC-INDIANA-DIRECT-HOGS-U 04-07 0059

TEXT.TITLE: INDIANA DIRECT HOGS UP 1.00/1.50 DLR - USDA
TEXT.BODY: barrows and gilt rose 1.00 to 1.50 dlr amid good demand, the usda said. top 51.00 dlrs per cwt. us 1-2 210-250 lbs 50.00-50.75, few 51.00. us 1-3 210-250 lbs 49.50-50.25 and 250-260 lbs 48.50-49.75. sows - steady/up 1.00 dlr. us 1-3 500-650 lbs 41.00-45.00, few 46.00. Reuter
